name: Dungeon Dare
description:
You were dared to enter an old dungeon and find your way back out. Unbeknown to you, an untimely end awaits you.

The downloaded version will likely work better, try it out if you're having issues!!

This game is an entry to the Themed Horror Game Jam#11

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to open doors

Credits: 
0x72's 16x16 Dungeon Tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
